name: mssql-dxt
description: A Desktop Extension to interact with Microsoft SQL Server, supporting multiple connections.

connections.title: MSSQL Server Connections
connections.description: Define one or more connections to MSSQL Servers.

name.title: Connection Name
name.description: A unique name for this connection (e.g., 'dev-server', 'prod-analytics').

server.title: Server Address
server.description: Hostname or IP address of the MS SQL Server instance.

port.title: Port
port.description: Port number for the MS SQL Server instance.

database.title: Database Name
database.description: The default database to connect to.

username.title: Username
username.description: Username for SQL Server Authentication. (Leave blank for Windows Auth)

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for SQL Server Authentication. (Leave blank for Windows Auth)

driver.title: ODBC Driver
driver.description: The name of the ODBC driver installed on your system for MS SQL Server.

trust_cert.title: Trust Server Certificate
trust_cert.description: Set to true to trust the server certificate automatically (e.g., for self-signed certificates).

tools.name: list_configured_connections
tools.description: Lists the names of all configured MSSQL connections.

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Executes a SQL query against a specified MSSQL connection.

tools.name: list_databases
tools.description: Lists all databases on a specified MSSQL server instance.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in the current/specified database on a specified MSSQL connection.

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Gets the schema (columns, types) for a specified table on a specified MSSQL connection.
